reviews.review_msg: She is disorganised, rude and arrogant. You have to be her buddy to receive good marks from her. Will bully you with questions and humiliate you in front of the class and laugh at your mistakes. Give feedback on all assignment the last day of class. We were allowed 7 minutes only to write her SFU evaluation before our final exams.

She is in fact a Poli Sci instructor and definitely not in the Criminology department. (or not that I'm aware of)  She is a very knowledgeable and very interesting instructor - this is my second class with her, and I have learned a lot.. and not just about poli sci!  Definitely take the time to go see her if you have questions.
